posts.post_content:
The recent thread got me thinking about parting with a few.  So, with that said, I have 2 PSA/DNA signed T206s for sale.

Doyle (bottom right in scan) - $305.00
Livingston - $275.00

Prices include shipping.

[IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/cards-1.jpg[/IMG]
Thanks for the message - no email address included however...  please feel free to email me at [url]jon_canfield@hotmail.com[/url].
